alert.note: Alert for Hickman; Lawrence; Lewis; Perry; Wayne (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lewis, Wayne, Lawrence, Perry and southwestern Hickman Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 245 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms centered 8 miles northwest of Waynesboro, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceburg, Hohenwald, Waynesboro, Linden, Loretto, Collinwood, Summertown, Clifton, Lobelville, St. Joseph, Ethridge, Henryville, Cypress Inn, Flatwoods, Lutts, Leoma, Westpoint, Iron City and Pleasantville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Brief heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized minor flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
